history.proof: intros a b c H. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime. hauto lq: on use: Zgcd_1_rel_prime, Z.divide_factor_l, rel_prime_div.

original: intros a b c H. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime in H. apply rel_prime_sym. apply Zdivide_intro with (q := c). apply Znumtheory.rel_prime_sym. apply rel_prime_bezout. apply bezout_rel_prime. apply rel_prime_le_prime with (p := Z.gcd a b). apply prime_gcd. split. apply Z.divide_pos_le. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Zis_gcd_rel_prime. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Zgcd_is_gcd.
